description: This pathway describes the glucosinolate derived from aromatic amino acid (Phe, Tyr, Trp) in *Arabidopsis thaliana*. This is based on the KEGG pathway and PlantCyc.  Some pathway entities are unknown and being investigated, these are denoted as "Catalyst" and "Metabolite" for now.
title: Glucosinolate biosynthesis (from aromatic amino acid)
